2_19xyLs9tyTZF9JaEcWBk5JtgWdYtQPQwt3.body: Bitshares will be delisted from bittrex because the memory consumption is over 64GB. Sad, Bitshares needs pruning feature but there isn't a dev who will implement it. Maybe Waves is the most suitable candidate for DEX.
